price: Maka akyerε wͻn sε: “Monsrε mo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ bͻnefakyε, nokorε sε, Ɔne Bͻnefakyε Hene.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
